abstract: Albert Pujols makes the defensive play of the game, and Chris Carpenter shows again why he's the best Cardinals starter since Bob Gibson.
snippet: Albert Pujols makes the defensive play of the game, and Chris Carpenter shows again why he's the best Cardinals starter since Bob Gibson.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - It didn't quite get a star on my scoresheet because the ball was not hit all that hard. But the play Albert Pujols made on Michael Young to end the top of the sixth inning of Game 1 was impressive just the same. Pujols ranged to his left, across the first base line, and tossed to pitcher Chris Carpenter covering first for the out.

headline.main: Pujols's Defense and Carpenter's St. Louis Legacy
